info.author: Tiny.be
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
Tiny ERP is a complete ERP and CRM. The main features are accounting (analytic
and financial), stock management, sales and purchases management, tasks
automation, marketing campaigns, help desk, POS, etc. Technical features include
a distributed server, flexible workflows, an object database, a dynamic GUI,
customizable reports, and SOAP and XML-RPC interfaces.
info.name: tinyerp-client
info.html_description: Tiny ERP is a complete ERP and CRM. The main features are accounting (analytic and financial), stock management, sales and purchases management, tasks automation, marketing campaigns, help desk, POS, etc. Technical features include a distributed server, flexible workflows, an object database, a dynamic GUI, customizable reports, and SOAP and XML-RPC interfaces.
